title: 1 Reason Ethereum Could Lead the Next Bull Market - The Motley Fool
summary: Ethereum's new deflationary mechanism, implemented through the London hard fork, could lead to increased demand and lower prices, making it a potential store of value. The mechanism burns fees, which vary depending on network demand, and could lead to a decrease in the total supply of Ether, potentially lowering its price. This is similar to the phenomenon that made Bitcoin valuable, and could position Ethereum as a store of value in the future. Investors may benefit from buying Ethereum while its price is low and enjoying the deflationary feature for the long term.

title: Russia's Sberbank plans to launch DeFi platform on Ethereum - Cointelegraph
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Sberbank, Russia's largest bank, is launching a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform on the Ethereum blockchain. The platform will be tested in private beta and then opened to commercial transactions by the end of April. The platform aims to become a prime DeFi ecosystem in Russia and displace traditional banking services. The announcement comes as Russia is yet to develop digital currency regulations, but the head of the Duma's Committee on Financial Market expects regulations to be adopted in 2023. Sberbank has previously faced delays in launching blockchain tools due to registration issues with the Russian central bank.

title: Ethereum [ETH]: Read this before going long, investor - AMBCrypto News
summary: Ethereum (ETH) has seen a significant price increase of over 40% since January, with a three-day straight increase as of the writing. The Relative Strength Indicator (RSI) is in a bull trend, with the Aroon Up line at 100% and the Aroon Down line at 42.8%. However, network growth has declined to roughly 25.9, indicating a decrease in popularity and adoption. Despite this, the indicator suggests that the current uptrend is robust, making it a favorable opportunity for long-term investors to enter the market. However, a dip in price is probable in the short term.

title: Ethereum Burning Reaches New High, Is ETH Warming Up For Another Rally? - NewsBTC
summary:
Ethereum (ETH) has reached a new high in its burning rate, with over 3,000 ETH burned per day, according to data from oklink. This is the highest point ever seen since November 2022. The increase in burning rate is attributed to the popularity of decentralized exchanges Uniswap and OpenSea, which have recorded significant trading volumes over the past months.

The Ethereum price chart indicates two possible scenarios: a retracement to the $1,300-$1,350 region or another bullish trend. The recent tap into external liquidity could signal a possible retracement, but if ETH invalidates this movement, it could lead to another upward rally.

In addition to the burning rate, Ethereum has also reached new highs in total staked ETH on the Beacon chain, with over 16.16 million ETH staked, representing 13.28% of the total Ether supply. Staking services providers such as Lido, Coinbase, and Kraken control a significant portion of the staked ETH.

title: Ethereum Shanghai Upgrade Progress: Will ETH Price Rise Or Fall? - CoinGape
summary: Ethereum Shanghai upgrade set to go live in March/April, allowing stakers to withdraw locked ETH. However, unlocking this amount may cause selling pressure, potentially impacting ETH price. Current price is $1,667.61 with a 5.51% 24-hour increase. Market trend is bearish due to Terra Luna and FTX contagion, as well as macroeconomic factors. Upgrade could lead to a price surge or dump, but it's uncertain.

title: Nouns Comic Books Turn Ethereum NFTs Into ‘Unconstrained Anarchy’ - Decrypt
summary: Nouns, an Ethereum-based NFT project, is expanding into comic books with a new series called "Nouns: Nountown." The comics will be published by Titan Comics and will feature characters from the NFT collection. The project was backed by the Nouns DAO, a decentralized autonomous organization made up of NFT holders, who control a sizable treasury to fund IP development and other projects. The comics will be released in tandem with Ethereum NFTs that provide access to digital issues and represent ownership in printed copies. The project is an experiment in open-source storytelling, with the creative team building around characters that other people own the original NFT of, and may feel an attachment to. The art files will also be released to the community for derivative works.

title: Top US Crypto Exchange Coinbase Adds Ethereum Staking Altcoin to Listing Roadmap - The Daily Hodl
summary: Coinbase, a top US crypto exchange, has added Liquid Staked ETH (LsETH) to its listing roadmap. LsETH is a new altcoin that allows users to stake their Ethereum (ETH) and receive a receipt token as evidence of ownership. The listing is part of Coinbase's effort to increase transparency and reduce front-running of listing announcements. Coinbase aims to list as many crypto assets as possible, as long as they meet the company's standards. As of writing, LsETH is trading for $1,668, slightly above ETH.

title: Ethereum Layer-2 Tokens Continue Incredible Run as Optimism (OP) Breaks All-Time High: Here's Why - DailyCoin
summary: Ethereum Layer-2 tokens, including Optimism (OP), are surging despite the bearish market. Layer-2 projects offload transactions to separate chains, reducing gas costs. OP has soared 230% in the past month and hit an all-time high of $3.20.

title: How to Sell Crypto with Ledger - Ledger
summary:
To sell crypto using Ledger, follow these steps:

1. Open Ledger Live and connect your Nano to your computer.
2. Check the 'Apps Installed' tab to ensure you have the Bitcoin and Exchange apps. If not, install them from the App Catalog.
3. Click on 'Buy/Sell' and select 'Sell' to enter the amount of Bitcoin you wish to sell.
4. Choose the accounts you wish to sell from and click 'Continue'.
5. Enter the amount of Bitcoin you wish to sell and choose the currency you want to receive.
6. Complete KYC if it's your first time on Coinify, or proceed if you have an existing account.
7. Add a bank account if needed, and agree to the terms and conditions.
8. Confirm the transaction on your Nano and check your email for updates from Coinify.

That's it! The sale is complete, and you can repeat the process for other cryptocurrencies as well.

title: Ethereum Based Tokens Showing Bullish Signs In February 2023 - CoinGape
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Ethereum-based tokens are showing bullish signs in February 2023, with several tokens surging in value. The top ERC20 tokens to buy include Wrapped Bitcoin, Chainlink, Shiba Inu, and The SandBox. These tokens have seen significant growth in recent days, with Wrapped Bitcoin up 3.41% and Chainlink up 6.55%. Shiba Inu has also seen significant growth, with a price increase of 4.21% over the past 7 days. The SandBox has surged by nearly 7.97% during the day. These tokens are considered good investment options for those looking to invest in the cryptocurrency market.

title: Ethereum News: Why ETH Price May Break $1800 In Feb 2023? - CoinGape
summary: Ethereum (ETH) price may reach $1,800 in February 2023 due to recent announcements from major firms such as the European Investment Bank and Visa. These announcements have led to an increase in the ETH price, which has successfully recovered from a crash caused by the bankruptcy of FTX. Despite high transaction fees and slow transaction speed, Ethereum remains a reliable cryptocurrency with potential for long-term investment. However, it is important to conduct thorough research and consult with financial experts before making any investment decisions.

title: Shiba Inu (SHIB) Is Top Traded Among Largest Ethereum Whales - DailyCoin
summary: Shiba Inu (SHIB) is the top traded cryptocurrency among largest Ethereum whales, with $75 million worth of tokens transferred to an anonymous wallet. The token has seen 3.9% profit in the last 24 hours and 7.6% in weekly terms. The community awaits updates on Shibarium, which will introduce a new token, Bone ShibaSwap (BONE), for gas fees.

title: NFT market shows signs of recovery as January trading volumes hit 7-month high - TechCrunch
summary: NFT market shows signs of recovery, with January trading volumes reaching 7-month high. Ethereum and Solana see strong growth, with Ethereum accounting for majority of trading volumes. Polygon experiences significant increase in trading volume, with 124% growth in January. DeGods and y00ts, two large Solana NFT projects, plan to migrate to other blockchains. Consecutive growth may indicate a broader upward trend in the crypto market, potentially driving creators to form new use cases in the NFT space.

title: Top Cryptocurrency Prices Today: Bitcoin and Ethereum Trade Lower - Analytics Insight
summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum prices are down today, according to Analytics Insight. The article warns that crypto products and NFTs are unregulated and can be highly risky, and advises readers to conduct their own research and consult financial experts before making any investment decisions. The article also includes a disclaimer stating that Analytics Insight is not responsible for any potential legal action or enforceable claims related to the information provided.

title: NFTs are making a comeback, how can you benefit? - The News Minute
summary: NFTs are experiencing a resurgence, with a shift towards utility-oriented mints and the interest of big brands like Starbucks and Nike in using them for loyalty programs. Social media platforms like Twitter and Facebook are also promoting NFT adoption. According to Ark Invest research, new NFT mints are focusing on providing utility, such as on-chain domain names and digital memberships.

title: Ethereum Reaches New High With 3040 ETH Burn, Led By Uniswap & OpenSea - TronWeekly
summary: Ethereum reached a new high of 3040 on February 2nd, fueled by increased usage and transactions on popular decentralized exchanges Uniswap and OpenSea. The cryptocurrency greed index is at a high level of excitement and anticipation, with a corresponding rise in Ethereum's value. Ethereum developers are set to launch an upgraded mainnet in mid-March, which will bring increased efficiency, reduced gas fees, and a new consensus algorithm. The upgrade is expected to make Ethereum more secure, scalable, and user-friendly. However, the smooth activation of the upgrade on testnets is crucial to ensure a successful mainnet launch.

title: Top ten smart contract platforms by staking market cap as of February 2023 - Finbold - Finance in Bold
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Top ten smart contract platforms by staking market cap: Ethereum, Cardano, Binance Coin, Avalanche, Polygon, Tron, NEAR protocol, Algorand, and Fantom. Ethereum and Cardano dominate the list with extensive network development activity and high reward rates. Cardano's staking feature has grown significantly in recent months, with over 70% of ADA's supply staked.
